
.. _file_core_interactive_mode.h:

File interactive_mode.h
=======================

|exhale_lsh| :ref:`Parent directory <dir_core>` (``core``)

.. |exhale_lsh| unicode:: U+021B0 .. UPWARDS ARROW WITH TIP LEFTWARDS



Interactive mode functionality on Windows. 



.. contents:: Contents
   :local:
   :backlinks: none

Definition (``core/interactive_mode.h``)
----------------------------------------




Detailed Description
--------------------

Le Nhan Pham 

2025

This header declares functions for the interactive command-line interface of the Gaussian Extractor application. 




Includes
--------


- ``string``
